name: Wave
description:
Wave is an indie game that has the goal of entertaining its players and at the same time offering them a challenging game.
It has a style and a very marked visual range, which fits perfectly with the simplicity of the gameplay itself.


In this game simply handle a ball that is swinging from right to left permanently, and you will only control the way in which to ascend, it is perfect because besides you only need a mouse to play it.
The difficulty of the game comes now, there will be several objects along the route that will make you lose the game if the ball hits them. Objects of different types, such as:
-Mobile platforms
-Immobile objects
-Immobile objects that become large and small over time.

It is a very simple game, with a medium difficulty, perfect to have a good time playing in a relaxed way.
